metadata.title: H2WW AI Learning Platform - Complete Bauhaus Foundation
metadata.description: Comprehensive Bauhaus design system foundation integrating AI companion interface, Itten color psychology, and geometric brand identity into a unified design language for the HowToWorkWith AI learning platform

bauhaus_principles.form_follows_function: Every interface element serves the learning process - no decorative elements that don't enhance understanding
bauhaus_principles.unity_of_design: Seamless integration between AI companion, color psychology, and geometric brand language
bauhaus_principles.simplicity_clarity: Clean, geometric interfaces that reduce cognitive load and focus attention on learning
bauhaus_principles.democratic_design: Accessible to all learners regardless of technical background or learning style
bauhaus_principles.industrial_craft: Precision in geometric proportions and systematic approach to design decisions

learning_psychology.progressive_disclosure: Information revealed in stages aligned with learner's geometric evolution (Circle → Square → Triangle)
learning_psychology.cognitive_load_theory: Visual hierarchy and color coding reduce extraneous cognitive burden - working memory capacity limited to 7±2 items
learning_psychology.constructivist_learning: Learners build knowledge through interaction with geometric metaphors and AI companion
learning_psychology.flow_state_design: Interface elements designed to maintain focus and engagement during learning

gestalt_principles_integration.figure_ground: Clear distinction between learning content (figure) and interface elements (ground)
gestalt_principles_integration.proximity: Related learning elements grouped using geometric containers
gestalt_principles_integration.similarity: Consistent geometric shapes indicate similar function types
gestalt_principles_integration.closure: Incomplete geometric patterns encourage active completion by learners
gestalt_principles_integration.continuity: Learning paths follow natural geometric flow lines
gestalt_principles_integration.common_fate: Elements moving together indicate shared learning objectives

visual_processing_optimization.70_percent_visual_rule: Primary learning content delivered through visual geometric metaphors
visual_processing_optimization.attention_direction: Size, contrast, and geometric positioning guide focus to critical learning elements
visual_processing_optimization.eye_tracking_validation: Design choices validated through user gaze pattern analysis
visual_processing_optimization.cognitive_efficiency: Reduce mental effort required to parse interface and focus on learning content

ai_fundamentals_red.usage: Primary actions, error states, important notifications

mastery_blue.usage: Completed states, expert content, trust indicators

innovation_orange.psychology: Creative combination of energy and discovery

advanced_purple.psychology: Deep mastery combined with foundational trust

font_families.display: Poppins - Geometric clarity for headings and brand elements
font_families.body: Inter - Optimized readability for learning content
font_families.code: Fira Code - Technical precision for code examples

size_scale_attention.primary_focus: 72px+ geometric elements for critical learning actions
size_scale_attention.tertiary_focus: 24px geometric elements for navigation and metadata

contrast_attention_control.high_contrast: AI fundamentals (red) on neutral backgrounds for critical learning moments
contrast_attention_control.medium_contrast: Discovery yellow for exploration and optional content
contrast_attention_control.low_contrast: Mastery blue for completed or foundational content

figure_ground_implementation.learning_content_figure: High contrast geometric containers with clear boundaries
figure_ground_implementation.interface_ground: Subtle neutral tones that recede from conscious attention
figure_ground_implementation.ai_companion_figure: Dynamic geometric avatar that maintains presence without distraction

visual_rhythm_patterns.geometric_repetition: Consistent 8px rhythm creates predictable visual scan patterns
visual_rhythm_patterns.progressive_complexity: Simple circles → detailed squares → complex triangles match learning complexity
visual_rhythm_patterns.white_space_breathing: Generous spacing between geometric elements prevents visual crowding

triangle_state.background: Dynamic gradient shifting based on progress

skill_tree.progression: Visual evolution from basic to advanced

information_chunking.geometric_grouping: Related concepts contained within single geometric boundaries
information_chunking.progressive_revelation: Complex information revealed through geometric expansion animations

attention_management.single_focus_principle: Only one geometric element can demand high attention at a time
attention_management.peripheral_awareness: Secondary elements maintain subtle geometric presence
attention_management.focus_indicators: Geometric outline system clearly indicates current attention target

mental_model_alignment.spatial_consistency: Learning concepts maintain consistent geometric spatial relationships
mental_model_alignment.metaphor_coherence: Circle-square-triangle metaphors applied systematically across all interfaces
mental_model_alignment.expectation_fulfillment: Geometric interactions behave consistently with established patterns

design_tokens.colors: CSS custom properties for easy theming
design_tokens.geometry: SVG icon system with consistent proportions

component_architecture.atomic_design: Atoms (geometric shapes) → Molecules (UI components) → Organisms (learning interfaces)
component_architecture.state_management: Learning progress integrated with UI state

development_workflow.design_system_first: All new features start with design system extension
development_workflow.learning_testing: User testing focused on educational effectiveness

phase_1_foundation.color_token_system: CSS custom properties for Itten colors
phase_1_foundation.typography_hierarchy: Web font loading and scale system

eye_tracking_studies.gaze_pattern_analysis: Validate that geometric hierarchy creates intended attention flow
eye_tracking_studies.fixation_duration: Measure cognitive processing time for geometric learning elements
eye_tracking_studies.scan_path_efficiency: Ensure geometric layout supports natural reading patterns

cognitive_load_measurement.dual_task_methodology: Test learning retention while performing secondary visual tasks
cognitive_load_measurement.reaction_time_analysis: Measure speed of geometric interface comprehension
cognitive_load_measurement.error_rate_tracking: Monitor mistakes caused by visual hierarchy confusion

gestalt_principle_validation.grouping_accuracy: Users correctly identify related learning elements
gestalt_principle_validation.figure_ground_clarity: Clear distinction between content and interface elements
gestalt_principle_validation.closure_engagement: Incomplete geometric patterns motivate learning completion
